tool_description: Validates content and visual assets against brand guidelines to ensure consistency and compliance with brand standards.

content_text.description: Text content to validate against brand guidelines

brand_voice_guidelines.description: Brand voice description: tone, personality, and communication style

visual_description.description: Description of visual elements if validating visual content

brand_keywords.description: Key brand terms and messaging points to check for inclusion

restricted_terms.description: Terms or phrases to avoid in content

error_messages: Empty content text: Provide text content for validation
Empty brand voice guidelines: Provide clear brand voice description
Brand keywords array too large: Maximum 20 keywords allowed
Restricted terms array too large: Maximum 15 restricted terms allowed
usage: Submit content text and brand voice guidelines for validation. Optionally include visual descriptions, brand keywords to check for, and restricted terms to avoid. Returns compliance score and specific recommendations.

brand_alignment.description: Overall assessment: excellent, good, fair, or poor

compliance_issues.description: List of specific brand guideline violations found

recommendations.description: Specific suggestions for improving brand alignment

approved_for_publishing.description: Whether content meets minimum brand standards for publication
